plugins.name: Ripplix - Animation Library
plugins.description:
Ripplix â€” friction-free design hand-off with motion

Skip the time-consuming prototypes and pin real-world interactions straight onto your Figma file.

Ripplix already has a curated library of 1 500 + micro-interactions from 300 + live apps & sites into an easy-to-search sidebar. One click drops a comment tag on the exact UI element (button, card, tabâ€¦) and links to a full-screen preview on ripplix.com so developers instantly see how it should feelâ€”timing, easing, choreography and all.


Why youâ€™ll use it every hand-off

  1. Contextual pins â€“ Each animation is attached as a Figma comment on the layer you select, so engineers donâ€™t have to hunt for it.
  2. Real-app reference â€“ Every clip comes from production UIs, giving devs proven motion patterns instead of speculative mocks.
  3. Search that speaks UX â€“ Filter by platform (Web, iOS, Android, Watch), pattern (hover, dropdown, empty stateâ€¦), industry or keyword.
  4. One-click preview â€“ Comment contains a â€œView on Ripplixâ€ link â†’ opens the HD interaction with playback controls, frame counter and downloadable Lottie/CSS snippets.
  5. Zero bloat â€“ Nothing is embedded in the Figma file except a tiny thumbnail + link, so your files stay light.


Typical Workflow

  1. Select a layer that needs motion polish.
  2. In the Ripplix sidebar search â€œhover + dropdownâ€.
  3. Preview candidates; click Add to Figma.
  4. A comment tag appears on your layer, click upon you can preview the motion.
  5. During hand-off, devs open the link, watch the real interaction, and build it confident theyâ€™re matching the reference.


Need help or want to suggest an animation weâ€™re missing?

Install Ripplix â†’ pin a motion reference â†’ ship delightful, on-brand interactionsâ€”without another endless prototype.

plugins.name: Voice to Text for Figma
plugins.description:
Easily insert text into Figma using your voice!

Click â€œOpen Voice Toolâ€ â†’ Start speaking in the browser â†’ Your speech will be transcribed and automagically added into your selected Figma text layer.

No typing. Just talking.


âœ… Use Case 1:

â€œTired of switching between docs and Figma just to copy-paste written content?â€

Speak directly into the pluginâ€™s voice tool and instantly push the transcription into your selected text boxâ€”no tab switching, no distractions.


âœ… Use Case 2:

â€œWant to insert longer text into your Figma design without typing it all out?â€

Use Voice to Text for Figma to dictate your content and have it transcribed directly into your designâ€”perfect for mockups, user flows, or note-taking during brainstorming.


Supported Features & Limits:

âœ… Languages Supported: English, Arabic, Chinese (Simplified), Dutch, French, German, Hindi, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish

ğŸ• Time Limit: Records up to 60 seconds per session, auto-warns you before timeout

ğŸŒ Browser Compatibility:

âœ… Supported: Google Chrome, Safari, Opera, Samsung Internet

âš ï¸ Partially Supported: Microsoft Edge, Firefox

âŒ Not Supported: Internet Explorer, Brave, Arc

ğŸ§  Auto-restart: On silence to ensure smoother capture

ğŸ™ Microphone Permission : Detects and guidance for Mac & Windows users.

ğŸ–¥ï¸ Figma Compatibility: Works seamlessly on both Figma Browser and Figma Desktop / Mac App

âœ… Accessibility Enhancements

â¤ï¸ Open Source Code: https://github.com/mryeshwanth/voice-figma-plugin


How it works:

  1. When you click Open Voice Tool, a new browser window will open to start recording.
  2. This is required because Figma Mac/Desktop plugins canâ€™t access your microphone directly.
  3. The tool uses your browser's built-in Web Speech API (SpeechRecognition) to transcribe your voice locally â€” nothing is sent to any external server.
  4. Once done, the transcription is securely sent back to the Figma plugin and inserted into your selected text node.
plugins.tagline: Convert your voice to text, directly into Figma.

plugins.name: ArcTouch Flutter Theme Generator
plugins.description:
Generate Text Styles

Automatically creates a TextStyleTheme class based on all text styles in your Figma project. This class extends ThemeExtension, allowing seamless integration into your Flutter theme.


Generate Theme

Generates a ColorTheme for each variable collection in your project. Each collection is converted into a ThemeExtension to be used within your Flutter theme. If multiple collections lead to class name conflicts, you can easily rename them in your project.


Generate Color Styles

Creates a const class containing color definitions. This is ideal for projects without design tokens or those that donâ€™t require color variations, providing simple, static color constants.


Generate Design Tokens

Creates const classes for design tokens such as spacings, paddings, and borders.



----------


Meet ArcTouch

ArcTouch creates lovable apps, websites, and connected experiences. Our Flutter development team helps companies design and develop successful cross-platform applications.


Contact us to learn how Flutter can accelerate your product roadmap and maximize your ROI.

plugins.name: Apply variable modes to all pages
plugins.description:
Apply your current page variable modes to all pages of your file!

Perfect for designers and teams working with design tokens, themes, or variable-based workflows.


How to use

1 - Go to a page (or create one) that has the desired variable modes applied

2 - Click "Apply this to all pages" / "Remove modes from all pages"


Done! You have easily copied the variable modes applied to your current page and apply them to all pages in your file with a single click.

plugins.name: Select and Inspect
plugins.description:
Why?


If you ever implemented a Figma plugin, you know how slow the process of inspecting specific properties (among the hundreds available) and values in a Figma file is.


This plugin aims to solve this problem by making logging as easy as possible!


Features

  1. Select one or more Figma elements to get them logged in the Console
  2. Add expressions to be evaluated on the selected Figma elements (name,id,reactions[0].actions results in each expression to be evaluated and logged in the Console)
  3. Stringy and format the result for better readability
  4. Preferences are stored locally


FAQ

Why not using the existing "Inspector" plugin?

Because the properties must be added to the UI by the plugin's author, limiting the plugin's scalability (as you can see in the reviews).
plugins.tagline: Select an item and get it logged in Console

84365.name: Select and Inspect
84365.description:
Why?


If you ever implemented a Figma plugin, you know how slow the process of inspecting specific properties (among the hundreds available) and values in a Figma file is.


This plugin aims to solve this problem by making logging as easy as possible!


Features

  1. Select one or more Figma elements to get them logged in the Console
  2. Add expressions to be evaluated on the selected Figma elements (name,id,reactions[0].actions results in each expression to be evaluated and logged in the Console)
  3. Stringy and format the result for better readability
  4. Preferences are stored locally


FAQ

Why not using the existing "Inspector" plugin?

Because the properties must be added to the UI by the plugin's author, limiting the plugin's scalability (as you can see in the reviews).
84365.release_notes: Invoke evaluated expressions if they are functions and await the returned promises if needed
84365.tagline: Select an item and get it logged in Console

plugins.description:
Turn your Figma designs into Storyteq dynamic editable ads.


The Figma to Storyteq Plugin enables designers to effortlessly export their Figma designs into Storyteq, turning static visuals into dynamic and customizable ad templates.


Streamline your workflow and scale content production with ease.


  1. Efficient Export â€“ Quickly send your Figma designs to Storyteq in just a few clicks.
  2. Dynamic Template Creation â€“ Convert static designs into adaptable templates ready for automation with Storyteqâ€™s Ad Engine.
  3. User-Friendly Interface â€“ Intuitive, seamless integration between Figma and Storyteq.


How It Works


  1. Design in Figma â€“ Create your visuals as usual.
  2. Export via Plugin â€“ Use the Figma to Storyteq Plugin to send Figma designs to Storyteq.
  3. Customize in Storyteq â€“ Modify and manage your dynamic templates for automated content creation.


Use Cases


  1. Marketing Campaigns â€“ Develop adaptable templates for various assets.
  2. Brand Consistency â€“ Ensure design uniformity across platforms.
  3. Rapid Prototyping â€“ Quickly generate dynamic versions of design concepts.

  1. Sign up for Storyteq if you haven't already.

  3. Authenticate your Storyteq account by logging in.

Storyteq helps global brands deliver content faster with the power of automation. Bring teams together to create pixel-perfect campaigns on brand, on time and on budget across markets and channels.


âœ” Save Time â€“ Reduce manual work and speed up content production.

plugins.name: Text Calculator
plugins.description:

The plugin keeps the text layer's original styles intact, including fonts and applied text styles.

Perfect for designers needing quick calculations while maintaining design consistency.

plugins.name: Smart Rename
plugins.description:
Smart Rename is a powerful Figma plugin built to streamline your workflow by letting you bulk rename frames customizable base names and smart suffixes like version numbers, dimensions, or sequence numbers.


It also fixes a common frustration in UI design: decimal positioning. When frames have non-integer X or Y values, exported assets often end up with unwanted white lines or blurry edges. Smart Rename solves this by auto-aligning frames to the nearest whole pixel, ensuring clean, sharp exports every time.


From organization to export-readiness, this plugin saves time and eliminates manual, error-prone tasksâ€”all in a few clicks.
plugins.tagline: Bulk rename and align Figma frames in seconds. Add version, size, or number suffixes effortlessly.

plugins.name: Time2Frame
plugins.description:
A powerful Figma plugin that lets you analyze, adjust, and visualize animation settings in real-timeâ€”enhancing precision and efficiency in motion design.


How It Works:


1. Animation Data Extraction

Instantly retrieve animation properties from selected frames, including:

  1. Animation Type: Move In, Fade, Smart Animate, and more.
  2. Direction: Left, Right, Top, Bottom.
  3. Easing Curve: Ease In, Ease Out, Linear, Custom Spring.
  4. Timing Details: Delay and duration (in milliseconds).

Effortlessly gain insights into how animations behave within your prototypes.


2. Frame Rate Conversion

Easily convert animation timing into frame counts based on industry-standard frame rates:

  1. 24 FPS
  2. 30 FPS
  3. 60 FPS

The plugin automatically recalculates delays and durations into frames, ensuring precise control over motion timing.


3. Real-Time Input Adjustments

Modify Delay and Duration values directly in the plugin and see instant updates in:

  1. Milliseconds (for precise timing).
  2. Frames (for seamless animation alignment across FPS settings).

No need for manual calculationsâ€”Time2Frame does it all for you.


4. Animation Preview

Visualize how your animation moves, scales, and fades with an interactive preview. The preview dynamically adjusts to reflect extracted animation properties, allowing designers to fine-tune their animations with confidence.


5. Custom Spring Curve Calculation & Visualization

If a Custom Spring easing is detected, Time2Frame breaks it down into:

  1. Stiffness
  2. Damping
  3. Mass

The plugin generates a real-time graph that illustrates the spring curve, making it easy to refine complex motion dynamics.


Key Features:


  1. Animation Data Extraction â€“ Retrieve animation type, easing, and timing in seconds.
  2. Frame Rate Conversion â€“ Automatically convert timing into frames for 24, 30, or 60 FPS.
  3. Instant Adjustments â€“ Modify animation values with real-time updates.
  4. Live Animation Preview â€“ See how animations behave with accurate visual feedback.
  5. Custom Spring Analysis â€“ Break down spring physics and visualize easing curves.
  6. Smart UI Integration â€“ Works seamlessly with Figmaâ€™s native environment.


Who Is It For?


Time2Frame is built for motion designers, UX/UI designers, and developers who need precise animation breakdowns and real-time adjustments in Figma. Whether youâ€™re fine-tuning micro-interactions or optimizing complex motion flows, this plugin streamlines your workflow and improves animation predictability across different frame rates.
plugins.tagline: Designed for motion designersâ€”select a frame, instantly analyze its animation settings in real time.

  • Build a crystal-clear project structure that's intuitive for you and your team.


Blazing-Fast Templates:

  • Hit the ground running every single time, no matter the project.


Unleash Your Creative Potential:

  • Focus on what you do best â€“ crafting phenomenal designs.
  • Organise Wiz automates the setup drudgery, freeing up valuable time to unleash your creative vision.


Imagine the possibilities. More time spent designing, less time spent organising. Happier designers, more efficient projects. That's the Organise Wiz magic.

plugins.name: Figma to Azure
plugins.description:
Create Azure work items without leaving Figma Â· figmatoazure.com


Key Features

  1. One-Click Creation: Select any Figma component to generate an Azure Board item.
  2. Automatic Previews: Visuals attach directly to the work item.
  3. Direct Linking: Clickable links between Azure work items and components.
  4. Custom Field Mapping: Match your Azure setup with flexible field configs.
  5. Team Area Support: Organize work in your projectâ€™s structure.
  6. Smart Field Detection: Autofills required Azure fields.


Why Teams Use It

  1. Save timeâ€”no more screenshots or copy-paste.
  2. Developers get full visual context.
  3. Sync design and dev workflows effortlessly.
  4. Keep everything traceable and connected.


How to Get Started

  1. Select a Figma component
  2. Add your Azure Personal Access Token (requires Read & Write access for work items)
  3. Enter your Azure DevOps URL
  4. Customize the item
  5. Click Create


Thatâ€™s itâ€”the plugin handles previews, links, and field setup for you.

plugins.name: Better Title Case
plugins.description:
Not a fan of built-in Figma's title case? Better Title Case got your back!


  1. Select a frame or a group to apply Better Title Case to all text layers inside
  2. Or directly select one or several text layers to apply Better Title Case only to these layers


Safe to use on text layers that have several styles/properties applied to them â€” plugin will not remove bold or underlined text from your layers.


Current Capitalization Rules:

Easily transform your Figma variables into reusable themes for Power Apps with our plugin. Figma to Power FX theme converter is a tool for Power Apps designers and developers who want to streamline their workflow and save time.


Key Features:

plugins.name: Retro Color Converter
plugins.description:
Transform your Figma designs into nostalgic retro-style PNG images with flexible bit depth control. Perfect for pixel art, game assets, and vintage aesthetics.


Features:

- Color depth options: 6-bit, 9-bit, 12-bit

- Three dithering modes: Flat, Gradient, Full

- Floyd-Steinberg algorithm for smooth transitions

- Auto-positioning next to original objects

- One-click conversion

- Supports all layer types


Ideal for retro games, pixel art, and creative effects. Complete control over color quantization and dithering.
plugins.tagline: Convert designs to retro-style PNG images with customizable bit depth and dithering options
